  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_en/140279</entry>
          </identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140279</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Masno središče predmeta (2)</string>
            <string language="en">Center of mass of an object (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mitte der Masse einer Nachricht (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Centre de la masse d'un objet (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Centro da massa de um objeto (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Centro di massa di oggetto (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κέντρο της μάζας ενός αντικειμένου (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Centro de la masa de un objeto (2)</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Masno središče prosto padajočega predmeta predstavljenega kot sistem štirih delcev povezanih z vzmetmi, vendar so delci skriti.</string>
            <string language="en">Center of mass of a falling object built from four particles interconnected with springs, but with particles hidden.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">masno središče</string>
            <string language="en">center of mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vzmet</string>
            <string language="en">spring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">templates</string>
            <string language="en">templates</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mitte der Masse einer fallenden Nachricht 
aufgebaut von vier Partikeln zusammengeschaltet mit Frühlingen, aber 
mit den Partikeln versteckt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Centre de la masse d'un objet en chute établi de
quatre particules interconnectées avec des ressorts, mais avec des 
particules cachées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Centro da massa de um objeto de queda construído
de quatro partículas interconectadas com molas, mas com as 
partículas escondidas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Centro di massa di oggetto cadente sviluppato da 
quattro particelle collegate con le molle, ma con le particelle 
nascoste.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το κέντρο της μάζας ενός μειωμένου αντικειμένου 
έχτισε τέσσερα μόρια που διασυνδέθηκαν από με την άνοιξη, αλλά 
με τα μόρια που κρύφτηκαν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Centro de la masa de un objeto que cae construido
a partir de cuatro partículas interconectadas con los resortes, pero 
con las partículas ocultadas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mitte der Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frühling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schablonen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">centre de la masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ressort</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">descripteurs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">centro da massa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">moldes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">centro di massa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">molla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mascherine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κέντρο της μάζας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άνοιξη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πρότυπα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">centro de la masa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">resorte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">modelos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
